title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. XII, subch. A, pt. 1904 - Removal From Temporary Release Program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. XII, subch. A, pt. 1904 - Removal From Temporary Release Program

State Regulations
§ 1904.1 - Revocation of temporary release
§ 1904.2 - Removal procedure
§ 1904.3 - Relapse Program
§ 1904.4 - Appeal of removal from temporary release program
§ 1904.5 - Parole board action affecting temporary release participation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. XII, subch. A, pt. 1904

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§112, 852

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
